title: Guerin de Lorraine Freeing Vienne from the Saracens
description: Guerin de Lorraine Freeing Vienne from the Saracens; Loyset Liédet (Flemish, active about 1448 - 1478), and Pol Fruit (Flemish, active about 1468); Written: Brussels, Belgium; written 1463 - 1465; illuminated 1467 - 1472; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and gold paint on parchment; Leaf: 23.5 x 19.1 cm (9 1/4 x 7 1/2 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 6, leaf 8; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
